title: Coastal Green Retreat: Family Oasis in Ustka’s Port District
description: Experience the serene union of comfort and artistry in this spacious 5-bedroom house nestled within Ustka’s gentle Port District. Generous open living spaces are framed with modern soundproof walls, built-in wardrobes sleekly concealing storage, and a rooftop deck that promises endless mural-painted sunsets over leafy treetops. Soak in the tranquility with three stylish bathrooms and all-day security for peace of mind. Enveloped by tailored green surroundings, it provides an inspired retreat for family life.
neighborhood_description: Port District in Ustka exudes a harmonized blend of urban vivacity and calming nature. With expanses of greenery, scenic bike paths, access to nearby highways, and a family-friendly vibe, this is a locale where young imaginations flourish. You’ll enjoy a balanced lifestyle, discovering local shops and buoyant community events that are signature of this lively coastal town.
lifestyle_benefits: tons of space for hobbies and gatherings
target_buyer: Ideal for a large or multi-generational family seeking a blend of space, versatility, and access to outdoor activities within a tranquil coastal neighborhood. Perfect for families longing for a beautiful home base surrounded by nature and easy family adventure.
market_positioning: This welcoming home is an enviable find for those prioritizing comfort and lifestyle, offering a rare combination of space and green tranquillity in Ustka at a competitive mid-market price point for the area and size.
